ch: 我想要訂位。
en: I'd like to make a reservation.

ch: 今天晚上**還有位子**嗎？
en: Do you have any tables available this evening?

ch: 我可以預訂十月五號星期一晚上六點半的兩人桌嗎？
en: Can I reserve a table for dinner for two at six thirty on Monday, Ocotber 5?

ch: 你們有兒童椅嗎？
en: Do you have high chairs?

ch: 不好意思，我們可以點餐了。
en: Execuse me, we're ready to order.

ch: 今天的特餐是什麼呢？你推薦什麼呢？
en: What is the dish of the day? What do you recommend?

ch: 可以幫我打包這道菜嗎？
en: Could you wrap this up for me?

ch: 請問可以給我帳單嗎？
en: May I have the check, please?

ch: 我只是看看。
en: I'm just looking around.

ch: 這是什麼材質呢？
en: What is it made from?

ch: 我可以試穿看看嗎？試衣間在哪裡呢？
en: Can I try it on? Where is the fitting room?

ch: 請問你們有大一點／小一點的尺寸嗎?
en: Do you have a larger / smaller size?

ch: 請問你們這個有**別的顏色**嗎？
en: Do you have this in another color?

ch: 你們有提供折扣嗎？
en: Do you offer discount?

ch: 可以**算我便宜**一些嗎？
en: Can you cut me deal?

ch: 我再**考慮**一下。
en: I have to think it over.

ch: 我想要退貨。
en: I would like to return some items.

ch: 請問我可以**退款**嗎？
en: Can I have a refund, please?

ch: 請問你們還有**空房**嗎？
en: Do you have anything available? / Is there any vacancy?

ch: 我有**以Winnie的名字**預訂房間。
en: I have a reservation under the name Winnie.

ch: 請問你們能**保管**行李到我們能入住的時候嗎？
en: Could you keep our luggage until we can check-in?

ch: 請問我的房間**有包含**早餐嗎？明天早上是幾點開始供餐呢？
en: Does my room include breakfast? When do you start serving tomorrow morinng?

ch: 請問可以幫我與我的家人安排**相鄰的房間**嗎？
en: Could I book adjoining rooms for my family?

ch: 請問你們可以**代為保管貴重物品**嗎？
en: Could you keep my valuables?

ch: 請問有可能再**多住一晚**嗎？／我可以**延長住宿**嗎？
en: Would it be possible to stay an extra night? Can I extend my reservation?

ch: 請問可以多**給我**兩條毛巾嗎？
en: Could you bring me two more towels, please?

ch: 請問我可以**晚些**在1點時退房嗎？
en: Can we check out a little later, at 1 o'clock?

ch: 可以給我一張有旅館住址的名片嗎？
en: Can I have a card with the hotel's address?

ch: 請問可以在明天早上8點**叫醒**我嗎？
en: Could I have a wake-up/morning call at 8 o'clock please?

ch: 我想確認我的航班。
en: I would like to confirm my flight.

ch: 我想選靠**走道**／**靠窗**的位子。
en: I would like to have an asile seat / a window seat.

ch: 這班飛機幾點登機呢？要到哪一個登機門登機？
en: When does the flight begin boarding? What gate does the flight board at?

ch: 請問這個**可以**帶上飛機嗎？我可以把這個袋子當**隨身行李**嗎？
en: Is this allowed on the plane? May I take this bag on as carry-on baggage?

ch: 我要前往／轉機洛杉磯。
en: I am going / transfer to LA.

ch: 請問**多久來一班**公車／火車？
en: How often does the bus/train run?

ch: 請問這班公車／火車**到哪裡**呢？
en: Where is this bus/train heading to?

ch: 請問這班公車／火車是每站都**停靠**的嗎？
en: Does this bus/train stop at every station?

ch: 請問你是照**跳錶**收費的嗎?
en: Do you use the meter?

ch: 請走 Taipei路／大道／街，並在7-11前面**讓我下車**。
en: Stay on Taipei Road / Avenue / Street, drop me off at the 7-11, please.

ch: 你**今晚想看**電影嗎？
en: Do you want to see a movie tonight?

ch: 我要兩張晚上九點「魔髮奇緣」的票。
en: I want two tickets to XXX at 9pm.

ch: 我可以選擇**前/中/後/排**的座位嗎？
en: Can I have front/center/back seats?

ch: 我們今晚要去唱卡拉OK。
en: We are going to kalaoke tonight.

ch: 你們介意我先插播一首歌嗎？
en: Would you mind if I'll put the song at the front of the list?

ch: 一起**合唱**吧。
en: Let's sing a duet.

ch: 這個**動作**我要連續做幾次？
en: How many reps should I do?

ch: 請問你能幫我**支撐**嗎？
en: Can you spot me?

ch: 你能推薦這個區域的**短程健行**嗎？
en: Can you recommend a short day hike in this area?

ch: 有誰知道如何**搭帳篷**呢？
en: Who knows how to set up a tent?

ch: 我受傷了，請問**急救箱**在哪裡呢？
en: I am injured, where is the first aid kit?

ch: 外面的雨下得可真是大啊！
en: The rain is really pouring outside.

ch: 我覺得這巴士已經誤點了20分了，也許它不會來了，對吧？
en: I think the bus is already late for 20 minutes. Maybe it's not coming, huh?

ch: 這件裙子跟你真的**很搭**！你穿藍色很漂亮。
en: The dress suits you really well! You look good in blue.

ch: 那個漢堡聞起來真**誘人**！我可以問你是從哪裡買的嗎？
en: That burger smells tempting! May I ask where you got it?

ch: 那箱子看起來很重，你需要幫忙嗎？
en: The box looks pretty heavy. Do you need a hand?

ch: 你看起來很困惑，我可以幫上什麼忙嗎？
en: You look confused. Can I help you with anything?

ch: 你也在這裡等很久了嗎？我困在這兒兩個多小時了。
en: Have you been waiting long, too? I've been stuck here for 2 hours.

ch: 你很常來這兒嗎？我覺得他們的漢堡是全鎮最棒的了！
en: Do you visit here often? I think they serve the best burger in town.

ch: 你覺得怎麼樣？我們要不要一起改共乘計程車呢？
en: What do you think? Shall we share the taxi?

ch: 你喜歡那部電影嗎？
en: Do you like the movie?

ch: 關於那部電影你有什麼想法？
en: What do you think about the moive?

ch: 你常來這兒嗎？
en: Do you come here often?

ch: 你多常來這兒呢？
en: How often do you come here?

ch: 其實我正在**上班的途中**所以不能**久聊**，我們**之後再聚聚**吧！
en: Actually, I'm on my way to work, so I can't talk any longer. Let's catch up sometime!

ch: 總之，我就不打擾你用餐了，真的很開心見到你。
en: Anyway, I'll let you get back to your meal. It was great seeing you.

ch: 噢，我不應該打擾你**太久**，你一定很忙吧！我就讓你**回去忙手邊的工作**了。
en: Well, I won't keep you any longer. You must be busy. I'll let you get back to work.

ch: 但願我可以，但這真的不是我**在行的**。
en: I wish I could, but this is really not my type of thing.

ch: 我很想要，但是我還有很多事要忙。
en: I'd love to, but I've got lots of things to do.

ch: 恐怕現在沒辦法。
en: I'm afraid this is not a good time.

ch: 謝謝你的邀請，但是我**現在行程很滿**。
en: Thank you for asking, but my schedule is full at the moment.

ch: Jerry應該可以跟你去。
en: Jerry might be able to go with you.

ch: 你可以去問問Judy，她會有興趣的。
en: You might wanna ask Judy. She would be interested.

ch: B: 我不餓，謝謝。
en: B: I'm good. Thanks!

ch: B: 沒關係，我可以點餐了。
en: B: I'm ok. I can order now.

ch: B: 沒關係，總會有下次的。
en: B: Don't worry about it. There's always next time.

ch: 當電話鈴響的時候，我正在睡覺。
en: The phone was ringing while I was sleeping.

ch: 為了要預防流感，我們都要更加頻繁的清洗雙手。
en: In order to prevent the flu, we all need to wash our hands more frequently.

ch: 我相信你，因為你是我最好的朋友。
en: I trust you because you're my best friend.

ch: 他知道我現在單身。
en: He knew I'm single.

ch: 鑒於最近發生的幾宗事件，我們提醒顧客要特別注意看好自己的個人物品。
en: In the light of recent incidents, we are asking our customers to take particular care of their personal belongings.

ch: 「我可以借這本書嗎？」「當然可以。」
en: "May I borrow this book?" "By all means."

ch: 我天真地以為我的新銀行帳戶是免費的，結果每個月我都被扣了10 英鎊的手續費。
en: I was naive to believe that my new bank account was going to be free. I was charged 10 pounds a month!

ch: 我妹妹幼稚地以為她第一個男朋友會永遠和她在一起。結果四個月後就分手了。
en: My sister was naive to think that her first boyfriend would stay with her forever. The relationship lasted 4 months.

ch: 你太天真了，他們才不會真的會接受你的建議。
en: You are so naive - they'll never take your suggestions seriously.

ch: 他只要守規矩就歡迎他來。
en: He's welcome to come along, provided that he behaves himself.

ch: 假如不下雨我就去。
en: I shall go provided that it doesn't rain.

ch: 他答應接受訪問，條件是訪問稿刊登前須經他同意。
en: He agreed to the interview, with the caveat that he could approve the final article.

ch: 她關於那個司機已經喝醉的證詞無可**辯駁**。
en: Nothing could refute her testimony that the driver was drunk.

ch: 他立誓決不泄露秘密。
en: He swore never to divulge the secret.

ch: 當地政府每年都為藝術項目**撥款**5000萬到一億英鎊。
en: The local authorities annually disburse between £50 million and £100 million on arts projects.

ch: 我認為鬥牛應該廢止。
en: I think bullfighting should be abolished.

ch: 牆上有個牌子，上寫「請勿吸煙」。
en: The sign on the wall said "Please refrain from smoking."

ch: 午餐之後，我們連續開了三場會議。
en: After lunch, we had three meetings in a row.

ch: 該國的出生率已連續下降二十年。
en: The country's birth rate has been falling 20 years in a row.

ch: 在試用期評估中，Kevin Edwards被稱讚工作做得跟部門裡有經驗的員工一樣有效率。
en: In his probationary evaluation, Kevin Edwards was praised for working as effectively as the experienced employees in the department.

ch: Pete一上床，就有人敲門。
en: No sooner had Pete gone to bed than someone knocked on the door.

ch: 除了兼職員工，所有員工都必須參加會議。
en: Other than part-time staff, all employees must attend the meeting.

ch: 臺北101顯然是這座城市最高的建築。
en: Taipei 101 is by far the tallest building in the city.

ch: 我們會及時給予回覆。
en: We will get back to you in a timely manner.

ch: 好的，讓我先把這個做完再回覆你。
en: Sure, let me finish this and get back to you.

ch: 這份雇用合約中明訂試用期是6個月。
en: The employment contract stipulates that the probation period is six months.

ch: 豪華海景房可以輕鬆讓最多七個人入住。
en: The luxurious beachfront rooms can easily accomondate up to seven occupants.

ch: 醫生給她注射以減輕疼痛。
en: The doctor gave her an injection to alleviate the pain.

ch: 那城堡要用巨資進行全面整修。
en: The castle will undergo extensive and costly renovations.

ch: 探險者得忍受艱苦。
en: Explorers have to withstand hardships.

ch: 委員會將在下星期四上午 11:30 開會。
en: The committee will convene at 11.30 next Thursday.

ch: 他放棄了對遺產的要求權。
en: He waived his claim to the estate.

ch: 他的演說不能保持住聽眾的興趣
en: His speech could not retain the interest of his audience.

ch: 第二學期自三月開始。
en: The second term commences in March.

ch: 他的職業是木匠。
en: He is a carpenter by trade.

ch: 他們現在很有錢，但仍很節儉。
en: They have plenty of money now, but they still tend to be thrifty.

ch: 我真的找不出理由再多休一天假了。
en: I can't really justify taking another day off work.

ch: 很難判斷他們會作何反應。
en: It's difficult to gauge how they'll react.

ch: 我們懇求您對於此一事件能給予協助和合作。
en: We solicit your close cooperation with us in this matter.

ch: 請把這些標籤系在您的手提行李上。
en: Please affix some lables on your handle-luggage.

ch: 最近幾周那兩個國家間的關係嚴重惡化了。
en: Relation between the two countries have deteriorated sharply in recent week.

ch: 自然選擇的作用似乎是十分確定的。
en: The action of selection seems to be fully deterministic.

ch: 我們要儘快做出決定。
en: It is imperative that we make a quick decision.

ch: 不同的工作者有不同的技能。
en: Different workers possess different skills.

ch: 近來裁員很多，所以士氣很低。
en: There have been a lot of job losses recently so morale is fairly low.

ch: 幾位外國要人出席了那個儀式。
en: Several foreign dignitaries attended the ceremony.

ch: 莎莉手術後一直恢復良好，但昨天她的病情再度復發。
en: Sally had been recovering well from her operation, but yesterday she experienced/suffered a setback.

ch: 我讓你來決定這件事。
en: I leave the decision to your discretion.

ch: 旅行社工作人員將負責安排交通和行程計劃。
en: The tour operator will arrange transport and plan your itinerary.

ch: 該團體和數個國外組織有聯繫。
en: The group has affiliations with several organizations abroad.

ch: 政府最近徹底改革了公共醫療保健服務。
en: The government has recently overhauled the healthcare system.

ch: 經過一段時期的波動后，預料倫敦市場的黃金價格將穩定下來。
en: Gold prices on the London market are expected to flatten out after a period of fluctuation.

ch: 這些日期只是暫定的。
en: These dates are only provisional.

ch: 他的醫生建議他不要做任何劇烈運動。
en: His doctor advised him not to do any strenuous exercise.

ch: 電燈發明以後煤氣燈就被**淘汰**了。
en: Gas lamps became obsolete when electric lighting was invented.

ch: 他的策略堪稱**典範**，尤其是考慮到當時的情形。
en: His tact was exemplary, especially considering the circumstances.

ch: 盡量不要為一些次要的枝節問題分心。
en: Try not to be distracted by incidental details.

ch: 此次失利令她渴求的冠軍夢想徹底破滅了。
en: The defeat ends any lingering hopes she might have had of winning the championship.

ch: 環境在本世紀遭到了空前的破壞。
en: This century has witnessed environmental destruction on an unprecedented scale.

ch: 我暫定七月去西雅圖旅行。
en: I have tentative plans to take a trip to Seattle in July.

ch: 過去兩年裡面，這間公司的發展業績不俗。
en: The company has shown exceptional growth over the past two years.

ch: 值得注意的是，1/3的學生不繳納任何學費。
en: It is noteworthy that one third of students do not pay any tuition fees.

ch: 這是我連續第五個週末加班。
en: This is the fifth consecutive weekend that I've spent working.

ch: 演講結束後你們會有足夠的時間提問。
en: You'll have ample opportunity to ask questions after the talk.

ch: 他小說的初稿有很多地方需要重寫。
en: The first draft of his novel needed a substantial amount of rewriting.

ch: 陪審團經過短時間商討後一致裁決有罪。
en: The jury returned a unanimous verdict of guilty after a short deliberation.

ch: 那些爆炸一定是在我們離開後發生的，因為我們甚麼也沒聽到。
en: Those explosions must have been subsequent to our departure, because we didn't hear anything.

ch: 他們長期生活在恐懼中，擔心被發現。
en: They lived in perpetual fear of being discovered.

ch: 桃子的表皮很嬌嫩，容易碰傷。
en: Peaches have delicate skins which are easily bruised.

ch: 他們認為法官對恐怖嫌疑分子過於寬容。
en: They believe that judges are too lenient with terrorist suspects.

ch: 我們的食物夠招待20位客人嗎？
en: Have we got adequate food for 20 guests?

ch: 機場的炸彈恐嚇事件之後，全體員工都被告誡要格外警惕。
en: Following the bomb scare at the airport, the staff have been warned to be extra vigilant.

ch: 幾乎所有關於這一事件的同時期的記載都遺失了。
en: Almost all of the contemporary accounts of the event have been lost.

ch: 他們花了大量時間使引擎運轉完美。
en: They spent an immense amount of time getting the engine into perfect condition.

ch: 為寫此書，投入了大量時間細心做前期準備。
en: Many hours of meticulous preparation have gone into writing the book.

ch: 迄今為止，人們一直認為這種藥物沒有任何副作用。
en: So far the drug is thought not to have any adverse effects.

ch: 她一時被那些外國路標搞糊塗了。
en: She was momentarily confused by the foreign road signs.

ch: 該産品的成功不能只歸因於廣告宣傳。
en: The product's success cannot be attributable solely to the ads.

ch: 如果我們要趕那班火車，就得準時出發。
en: We'll have to leave fairly promptly (= on time) if we want to catch that train.

ch: 他提了幾個有關的問題。
en: He raised several pertinent questions.

ch: 免徵這項稅收的商品包括書籍和童裝。
en: Goods exempt from this tax include books and children's clothes.

ch: 監獄改革條例得以出臺多虧她大力促成。
en: She was instrumental in bringing about the prison reform act.

ch: 該法律這一部分條款僅適用於有五名以上僱員的公司。
en: This part of the law is only applicable to companies employing more than five people.

ch: 我們的成功有賴於你的支持。
en: Our success is contingent upon your support.

ch: 馬不是美洲原產的動物——是西班牙人帶來的。
en: The horse is not native to America - it was introduced by the Spanish.

ch: 公眾對近來在食物中發現危險毒素一事非常不安。
en: There's a lot of public concern about/over dangerous toxins recently found in food.

ch: 買汽車要繳很高的國內稅。
en: Cars are subject to a high domestic tax.

ch: 附上的旅遊行程可能會變動。
en: The attached itinerary may be subject to change.

ch: 我們應該認識到並非每一樁投訴都是合理的。
en: We should be cognizant of the fact that every complaint is not a justified complaint.

ch: 如果能和平解決就沒有必要派遣聯合國維和部隊了。
en: A peaceful solution would obviate the need to send a UN military force.

ch: 被圍困的小鎮沒有足夠的食物度過這個月了。
en: The besieged town doesn't have enough food to see the month out.

ch: 你們制訂應急方案了嗎？
en: Have you made any contingency plans?

ch: 這份報紙發行量有15萬份。
en: The paper has a circulation of 150,000.

ch: 一些問題的媒體報導往往太淺，這意味著它沒有足夠的解釋。
en: The media coverage of some issues is often too shallow, meaning it doesn’t explain enough.

ch: 由於設備維護的疏忽，使得設施裡的一台機器故障了。
en: A machine in the facility broke down due to a lapse in equipment maintenance.

ch: 我的鞋已經顯得舊了。
en: My shoes are showing signs of wear.

ch: 它在規定的免費行李額範圍內。
en: It is within the free baggage allowance.

ch: 許多公司定期對僱員進行工作鑒定，通常是每年一次。
en: Many companies operate regular job appraisals, often on an annual basis.

ch: 隊員必須保證參加整個賽季的比賽
en: Players must make a commitment to play for a full season.

ch: 一旦我們有了結果，就可以做出合理的治療決定。
en: Once we have the results, we can make informed decisions about treatment

ch: 作為一名未來的員工，你覺得我們公司企業文化中哪一個部分讓你印象深刻
en: What aspect of our company's corporate culture has made a favorable impression on you as a prospective employee ?

ch: 請不要丟下您的行李無人照管。
en: Please do not leave your luggage unattended.

ch: 較大號隨時都有貨。
en: Larger sizes are readily available.

ch: 所有住戶都必須在車輛上貼出停車許可證，否則會有被拖吊的風險。
en: All redidents must display a parking permit on their vehicles or risk being towed.

ch: 銷售量的穩健增長，可以歸因於我們最新的產品系列的人氣。
en: The moderate increase in sales can be attributed to the popularity of our latest product line.

ch: 這位電影導演得到全球認可為一位創新電影製作者。
en: The movie director has gained recognition around the globe as an innovative filmmaker.

ch: 聯合國將決定軍隊從該地區撤軍的條件。
en: The UN will dictate the terms of troop withdrawal from the region.

ch: 我們無法從這些數字中推斷出太多東西。
en: We cannot deduce very much from these figures.

ch: 散發出的氣味證明下水道顯然已經被堵塞好幾天了。
en: From the smell it was evident that the drains had been blocked for several days.

ch: 這些疾病在幼兒中更普遍。
en: These diseases are more prevalent among young children.

ch: 事故之後制定了嚴格的安全規範。
en: Stringent safety regulations were introduced after the accident.

ch: 新書陳列在商店前方桌上的一個顯眼位置。
en: New books are displayed in a prominent position on tables at the front of the store.

ch: 失業率再度下降，儘管降幅沒有上個月般明顯。
en: Unemployment has fallen again, although the change is less marked than last month.

ch: 飯店房客務請在中午之前退房。
en: Hotel guests are requested to vacate their rooms by noon.

ch: 現在更多的銀行開始安裝監視錄影機。
en: More banks are now installing surveillance cameras.

ch: 她驕傲地誇口説這個肥皂劇她從未漏看過一集。
en: It is her proud boast that she has never missed a single episode of the show.

ch: 讓我吃驚的是，她完全無視他人的意見。
en: What amazes me is her complete disregard for anyone else's opinion.

ch: 那個繁忙的車輛入口處對行人來說很不安全。
en: The busy traffic entrance was a hazard to pedestrians.

ch: 我不能再拖著不去看牙醫了。
en: I can't put off going to the dentist any longer.

ch: 我無法在這麼短的時間內取消我的安排。
en: I can't cancel my plans at such short notice.

ch: 有些食譜裡，你可以用人造牛油代替牛油。
en: You can use margarine in place of butter in some recipes.

ch: 這種植物僅葉子可食。
en: Only the leaves of the plant are edible.

ch: 雖然這本小說在評論界贏得讚譽，但並不暢銷。
en: Despite the critical acclaim, the novel did not sell well.

ch: 你們的聚會是誰承辦的？
en: Who catered your party?

ch: 現在你先整理好你的房間。
en: For the time being, you'll clean up your bedroom.

ch: 難民們衣衫襤褸，饑腸轆轆。
en: The refugees were shabby and hungry.

ch: 月臺上有一個出售零食的自動售貨機。
en: There is a vending machine on the platform that dispenses snacks.

ch: 我們過得非常愉快，決定再多待一個星期。
en: We were having such a good time that we decided to prolong our stay by another week.

ch: 如果您現在取消的話，恐怕您不能拿回訂金。
en: If you cancel now, you forfeit your deposit.

ch: 這小屋是用木板建造的。
en: The hut was made out of pieces of wood.

ch: 她訪問了半途而廢的減肥者，想找出他們放棄的原因。
en: She interviewed dieters who had failed to stay the course to find out why they had given up.

ch: 我工作的大樓通風非常好／差。
en: I work in a very well-/poorly-ventilated building.

ch: 我可以挖的像發瘋的囓齒動物。
en: I'll dig like a psychotic rodent if I have to.

ch: 她穿著一件黑色絲質晚禮服。
en: She wore a black silk evening gown.

ch: 這將給你一個取得全面經驗的機會。
en: It will give you an opportunity to round out your experience.

ch: 現在本應是巴厘島最繁忙的旅遊旺季。
en: It should be the height of the season in Bali.

ch: 儲存的穀物經常受到害蟲的破壞。
en: Stores of grain are frequently attacked by pests.

ch: 慈善組織的工作獲得媒體的廣泛宣傳。
en: The work of the charity has been widely publicized throughout the media.

ch: 此雜誌開始依賴於比賽和抽獎活動，特別地為了吸引了年輕讀者。
en: The magazine came to depend on competitions and sweepstakes, particularly to lure younger subscribers.

ch: 新娘和新郎在教堂外擺姿勢照相。
en: The bride and groom posed for pictures outside the church.

ch: 有人看到那次襲擊嗎？
en: Did anyone witness the attack?

ch: 抵押權人成為土地所有人。
en: The mortgagee becomes the proprietor of the land.

ch: 她把圍巾鬆鬆地披在肩膀上。
en: She draped the scarf loosely around her shoulders.

ch: 我們去澳大利亞的機票包括在新加坡停留兩晚的費用。
en: Our tickets to Australia include a stopover for two nights in Singapore.

ch: 買這套設備首筆花費為2000美元，要是產品賣得好，你每月可以賺得500美元。
en: For an initial outlay of $2,000 to buy the equipment, you can earn up to $500 a month if the product sells well.

ch: 這個專案計劃顯然需要一個特製的電腦系統。
en: The project clearly requires a tailored computer system.

ch: 入場觀眾比上個賽季增多了。
en: The number of spectators going through the turnstiles is up from last season.

ch: 導演將在下週舉行試演，以確定主要角色的人選。
en: The director is holding auditions next week for the major parts.

ch: 琳達忙于重新裝修她的房子
en: Linda was occupied with the work of redecorating her house

ch: 那是一個令人毛骨悚然的故事，講的是一座凶宅還有裡面的幽靈。
en: It is a thrilling tale of a haunted house and the ghosts therein.

ch: 這些記憶不會隨著時間的流逝而淡漠。
en: These memories will not be diminished by time.

ch: 這本書說明了戰鬥中發生的事情。
en: This book gives an account of what happened during the battle.

ch: 他不能想像有一天他會沒有工作。
en: He couldn't conceive of a time when he would have no job.

ch: 現在船正在駛離海岸，而且風向可能對我們不利。
en: The ship is on the offshore tack and the wind may fail us .

ch: 新總統在今晚午夜就職。
en: The new president assumes office at midnight tonight.

ch: 她在為英國廣播公司的電視臺報導美國大選。
en: She's covering the American election for BBC television.

ch: 他服了22年兵役。
en: He served in the army for 22 years.

ch: 不用擔心——我們很快會解決。
en: Don't stress over it - we'll soon get it sorted out.

ch: 在這次地震中，大多數建築物受到的破壞都很小。
en: Most buildings sustained only minimal damage in the earthquake.

ch: 政府設立了專門委員會來調查市中心區的暴力問題。
en: The government has set up/established a commission to investigate the problem of inner city violence.

ch: 機師改變航向避免了一起碰撞事故。
en: The pilot avoided a collision by changing course.

ch: 表上寫明，所有個人財產都在該保險承保範圍之內。
en: It says on the form that the insurance covers all personal effects.

ch: 他的語言天賦驚人。
en: His facility for languages is astonishing.

ch: 我們在條約中增添了一些條款以保護外籍勞工。
en: We have inserted certain provisions into the treaty to safeguard foreign workers.

ch: 保險公司為針對養老金欺詐指控的索賠安排了準備金。
en: The insurance company made a provision against claims over alleged pension fraud.

ch: 我們房子的租賃期快滿了。
en: The lease on our house is near the end of its term.

ch: 下一班公車甚麽時候來？
en: What time is the next bus due?

ch: 我們目前沒有計劃。
en: We have no immediate plans.

ch: 法律規定孩子不上學父母要負責任。
en: The law holds parents liable if a child does not attend school.

ch: 這個城鎮靠近河邊的地區很容易遭到水淹。
en: The areas of town near the river are liable to flooding (= are often flooded).

ch: 這是一座老建築物，但結構依然完好。
en: It's an old building but it's still structurally sound.

ch: 我只要一小份就好，謝謝。
en: Just a modest portion for me, please.

ch: 需要採取措施以加快進度。
en: Something needs to be done to expedite the process.

ch: 我認為你忽略了一個重要的事實。
en: I think there is one key fact that you have overlooked.

ch: 這裡確實有一股煙味兒。
en: There's a distinct smell of cigarettes in here.

ch: 這位球員宣佈他即將從國家隊退役。
en: The player announced his impending retirement from international football.

ch: 喬治突然衝進房間裡，我們的談話戛然而止。
en: Our conversation came to an abrupt end when George burst into the room.

ch: 他很擅長演講，總能吸引大批的聽眾。
en: He's an excellent speaker who always draws a crowd.

ch: 帳戶上的存款將會以7%的利率生息。
en: Interest will accrue on the account at a rate of seven percent.

ch: 這樣的钜額投資必然會有一定的風險。
en: Such a large investment inevitably entails some risk.

ch: 在市中心限制停車的試驗方案使交通擠塞的問題更加嚴重。
en: Attempts to restrict parking in the city centre have further aggravated the problem of traffic congestion.

ch: 他推測該公司不久就會陷入財務危機。
en: He conjectured that the company would soon be in financial trouble.

ch: 這家旅館親切而舒適。
en: This hotel is a homely and comfortable establishment.

ch: 他對這個企劃案產生了極大的興趣。
en: He took an avid interest in the project.

ch: 她援引了幾位赫赫有名的學者來支持她的論點。
en: She invoked several eminent scholars to back up her argument.

ch: 由於手頭上的延期交貨訂單過多，我們無法答應八月之前裝運。
en: With so many back orders on hand, we can not promise any shipment before August.

ch: 她為幾本法律期刊撰稿。
en: She has written for several legal periodicals.

ch: 由於支票被銀行拒付，我不得不付一筆罰款。
en: I had to pay a penalty fee when my cheque bounced.

ch: 估計地方議會將贊同委員會的提議。
en: The Council is expected to endorse the committee's recommendations.

ch: 政府決意保護其煙草專賣權。
en: The government is determined to protect its tobacco monopoly.

ch: 拖欠未清餘額的帳戶將不再辦理之後的訂單。
en: Further orders will not be processed on those accounts where outstanding balances are overdue for payment.

ch: 這個國家一步步滑入經濟衰退的谷底。
en: The country is sliding into the depths of (a) recession.

ch: 他的刑期被縮減至兩年。
en: His prison sentence was remitted to two years.

ch: 他在芝加哥做建築工，把每月工資的一半寄回在菲律賓的家。
en: He worked as a builder in Chicago and remitted half his monthly wage to his family in the Philippines.

ch: 豐盛的午餐使我一下午都懶得動彈。
en: A heavy lunch makes me sluggish in the afternoon.

ch: 有人在河邊發現了一件衣服。
en: An article of clothing was found near the river.

ch: We need a 20percent deposit up-front with the balance due within 60days of the invoice date.
en: 我們要先收百分之二十的訂金。餘款在發票開出後60日內付清。

ch: 這幅畫將在下週拍賣。
en: The painting will be sold at auction next week.

ch: 因為天氣寒冷，明天的比賽取消了。
en: Tomorrow's match has been called off because of the icy weather.

ch: 請您照料一下我的攤位好嗎?
en: Would you please watch over my booth?

ch: 俄國否認了攻擊的責任歸屬，並也以驅逐美國外交官員與關閉美國領事館作為回應。
en: Russia denies responsibility for the attack, and responded to the U.S. by expelling U.S. diplomats and closing a U.S. consulate.

ch: 這本書很有爭議。
en: The book was very controversial.

ch: 孩子的父母獲取了共同監護權。
en: The parents were given joint custody.

ch: 五人因製售假鈔被起訴。
en: Five people were indicted for making and selling counterfeit currency.

ch: 人們對一些政治犯在關押期間死去表示關注。
en: Concern has been expressed about the death in detention of a number of political prisoners.

ch: 即使是輕微的違法行為也將受到嚴厲的懲罰。
en: Even minor infringements of the law will be severely punished.

ch: 公司一直在推卸責任，但同意這一調解方案以避免漫長的訴訟所帶來的花費。
en: The company has consistently denied responsibility, but it agreed to the settlement to avoid the expense of lengthy litigation.

ch: 《市政條例》第126條禁止在該地區停放車輛。
en: City Ordinance 126 forbids the parking of cars in this area.
